title: Automation Hub Empty State

detailed_design.description: Add empty-state messaging when Automation Hub sections (Agents, Cron Jobs, Automations) have no data. Backend returns empty arrays; users saw blank lists with no explanation.
detailed_design.solution: When agentProcesses, cronJobs, or automations are empty (after filter), show italic helper text: 'No X configured. Add from Settings when available.'

acceptance_criteria: Background Agents section shows message when empty
Cron Jobs section shows message when empty
Automations section shows message when empty
Message is helpful and does not imply error

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to understand why the Automation Hub appears empty.
